guides.name: Bryson Beals
guides.desc: Bryson Beals is a calm and cheery person. He is a guy that makes you laugh. He likes hiking, river rafting, and swimming. It may not look like him, but he also boasts to be a good cook.

guides.name: Rhett Silver
guides.desc: Rhett Silver is great at what he does. He started his career early because of his love for adventure. He is a very passionate at helping others learn. He also enjoys a good BBQ.

guides.name: Kristie Hill
guides.desc: Kristie Hill is a bright and quick-witted girl. She can do just about anything! She enjoys being in the nature and likes the peace and quiet it provides.

guides.name: Lauren Bernard
guides.desc: Lauren Bernard is very brave and outgoing. She enjoys being with others the most. She also has a knack for outdoor activities and goes for quite a few trips each year.
